entry.title: StackMob Lightning Talk
entry.content:
So I finally found an opportunity to deliver a quick lightning talk on StackMob at our monthly CodeSlice sessions in work. Knocked it up today over lunch and presented it tonight. Would like to pull this one out into a more in depth and interactive look... just waiting for someone to ask :)

Video

Slides

entry.title: Backend as a Service - Part One
entry.content:
I recently wrote an article for CloudSpring (a part of the SitePoint family) around what you can expect and what you should think about when going for one of the "Backend as a Service" offerings on the market.

The article is now live.

CloudSpring: Backend as a Service Part 1

Part 2, the one where I look at whats actually out there, will be ready within the next week.
